original_title: Never Fall In Love With a Straight Girl
overview: Kari, a masculine-presenting lesbian, and Shakerra, her bisexual ex-girlfriend, are moving out of their increasingly expensive townhome in gentrified NW, Washington D.C. Although Kari still secretly loves Shakerra, she refrains from telling her and spews biphobic rhetoric about Shakerra on her blog. With Shakerra being ready to move out and move on, Kari has a limited time to tell Shakerra her true feelings.
title: Never Fall In Love With a Straight Girl
